name: Save new SendOwl orders to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Every time a new order is completed in SendOwl, Make will automatically add it to a new row in a Google Sheet spreadsheet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1aT7JpRU8w_mVsodrEuRRCmvyyxAFzCXkZBT1jyQwTro/edit?usp=sharing).
